constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: A4D Storage and distribution to residential

description:
There is a large tree in front of the property which is extremely tall. The branches are overgrown the roof and grown over the roof and is now
obstructing the drains and gutters, which is causing mould growth internally. The branches are also obstructing natural daylight. The leaves
and branches are clogging up the drains and the tree needs to be pruned to at least 4-5 metres and the crown needs to be reduced by 15-
20%
The tree is so tall and overgrown, we would like to reduce the tree length to the size of the roof and we like to cut it in to a 'lollipop' shape.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">This permission shall expire after a period of two years from the date of this decision.</span></p><p><b style="font-weight:normal;" id="docs-internal-guid-cf7d85de-7fff-916e-ed96-e768f277e0a1"><br></b></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON:&nbsp; In order that the Local Planning Authority can review any change in circumstances after this period and to avoid the accumulation of unimplemented permissions.</span></p><p><b style="font-weight:normal;"><br></b></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The tree works hereby approved shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the description on this notice of approval by a suitable qualified tree surgeon and in accordance with BS3998:2010 ‘Recommendations for tree works’ (or any standard that reproduces or replaces this standard).&nbsp;</span></p><p><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON:&nbsp; In the interests of visual amenity and good arboricultural practice, having regard to Policy LP51 in the Local Plan 2033 (adopted 2020).</span></p>
